QueryText: ASKING ABOUT THE CONTROL MEASURE OF LEAF CURL (VIRAL DEASEASE) IN CHILLI.
KCCAns: SUGGESTED TO SPRAY DIMETHOATE 30 EC @ 2ML/LT OF WATER OR ACEPHATE @ 1GM/LT OF WATER.COLLECT AND DESTROY INFECTED VIRUS PLANTS AS SOON AS THEY ARE NOTICED.

QueryText: ASKING ABOUT THE CULTURAL PRACTICES OF BLACK GRAM.
KCCAns: DETAILS GIVEN(TREAT THE SEED WITH CARBENDAZIM OR THIRAM@2GM/KG OF SEED,SOWING-BROADCASTING OR DEBBLING-ROW TO ROW 30 CM,PLANT TO PLANT-15CM,DEPTH-3-4 CM,LIME @125 KG/SANGAM,FERT-UREA-111KG,SSP-94KG,MOP-17 KG/SANGAM.FOLIAR SPRAY OF NAA OR SALICYLIC ACID 100MG/LT OF WATER ONCE AT PRE FLOWERING AND ANOTHER AT 15 DAYS THERE AFTER.
